name: Beyond The Screen
description:
A school project I have been wanting to remake. I had a lot of fun making it back then.

It's a bit shit, but I still like the concept. It is a Metroidvania puzzle plateformer, you go through the world and unlock new abilities to get further. The main mechanic plays with the edge of the screen, when the player quits the screen on one side he reappears on the other, the difficulty is to find how to place the screen.

A level editor is included.
